title: STAT+: AI could soon renew prescriptions without clinician help. Should the FDA make sure it’s safe?
description: In a pilot, Utah is testing use of AI for renewing drug prescriptions. Experts ask if it should be regulated as a medical device.
content: In a pilot, Utah is testing use of AI for renewing drug prescriptions. Experts ask if it should be regulated as a medical device.
